WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARGM-LOC: In a story May 13 about President Donald Trump 's promise to help Chinese telecommunications company ZTE] , [ARG0: The Associated Press] [V: reported] [ARGM-MNR: erroneously] [ARG1: that Amanda De]
